title: Politicians, Founders Motivate Crypto Voters on Day One of the America Loves Crypto Tour
description: Prominent politicians and crypto industry leaders from Arizona encourage pro-crypto voters to head to the polls in November on the first stop of a five-date swing state tour.
author: By Frank Corva

title: Venezuelan Opposition Leader María Corina Machado Calls Bitcoin a “Lifeline” in Exclusive Interview
description: María Corina Machado, Venezuelan opposition leader, discusses Bitcoin as a "vital means of resistance" for Venezuelans suffering from hyperinflation under the Chávez and Maduro regimes.
author: By Nik Hoffman

title: Advancing Bitcoin Security: The Journey from Basic Wallets to Advanced Protocols
description: A look at the history of the evolution of Bitcoin wallets.
author: By Kiara Taylor

title: Mastercard Launches Euro Denominated Non-Custodial Bitcoin Debit Card
description: Mastercard has launched a euro debit card enabling direct spending of Bitcoin and crypto from non-custodial wallets at its over 100 million merchants. The move reflects Mastercard's expanding efforts to bridge Bitcoin with its traditional payments network.
author: By Vivek Sen

title: Blockstream Opens New Funding Round For Its Second Bitcoin Mining Security Token
description: Blockstream’s second Mining Note — the BMN2 — is designed much like the successful BMN1.
author: By Frank Corva

title: Coinbase CFO Says Kamala Harris Campaign Accepts Crypto Donations: Fortune
description: Fortune reports that Coinbase CFO said Kamala Harris is using Coinbase Commerce to accept cryptocurrency donations for her presidential campaign.
author: By Nik Hoffman

title: Choose Privacy
description: Technological capability, on its own, is not enough to create Bitcoin privacy. Unless users and society actively defend and demand privacy, it will die. From "The Privacy Issue".
author: By Shinobi

title: U.S. Spot Bitcoin ETFs See Record $287 Million in Outflows, Except BlackRock
description: U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs experienced significant outflows yesterday, totaling $287 million, with BlackRock being the only exception, reporting no withdrawals.
author: By Nik Hoffman

title: UTXO Research Report: State Of The Bridges
description: A research report analyzing the different trust models and functioning mechanisms of proposed and existing two-way pegs for Bitcoin layers.
author: By UTXO

title: Switzerland's Fourth Largest Bank ZKB Launches Bitcoin Trading
description: Switzerland's fourth largest bank, Zürcher Kantonalbank (ZKB), has launched Bitcoin and crypto trading and custody services amid the country's open regulatory environment.
author: By Vivek Sen

title: FBI Warns of North Korean Hackers Targeting U.S. Bitcoin And Crypto ETFs
description: The FBI has issued an alert warning that North Korean hackers are attempting to steal cryptocurrency funds from U.S.-based ETFs using sophisticated social engineering techniques.
author: By Nik Hoffman

title: Privacy and Pain: Craig Raw, Creator Of Sparrow Wallet, On Self-Custody
description: An interview with Craig Raw, creator of the popular Sparrow Wallet, on Bitcoin privacy best practices and pain as a teacher. From "The Privacy Issue".
author: By Frank Corva

title: Relai’s Bitcoin Mission: Bringing Europeans the Orange Coin Despite the Red Tape
description: Relai co-founder and CEO Julian Liniger wants to onboard as many EU and UK citizens as possible to Bitcoin, even if that means having to jump through regulatory hoops.
author: By Frank Corva

title: Why The DNC Doesn't Care About Bitcoin
description: Politicians cater to their voting base, it's that simple. If you want politicians to care about Bitcoin, their voters need to care.
author: By Shinobi

title: Bitcoin Hashrate Records New ATH Surpassing 740 EH/s
description: The Bitcoin network hashrate hit a new all-time high of 746 EH/s on September 3rd, showcasing improved security and fundamentals. This comes as Bitcoin prices decline, underscoring the disconnect between short-term pricing and long-term network health.
author: By Vivek Sen

title: Bitcoiners and Wobblies: Labor Day Edition
description: A look at the history of the American and global Labor Movement, and the parallels between Bitcoin's and the labor movement's evolutions.
author: By Dom Bei

title: The Fight for Bitcoin Privacy Has Truly Begun
description: "Then they fight you" has finally arrived. Financial privacy is in the crosshairs and Bitcoin's promise as "freedom money" is at stake. From "The Privacy Issue".
author: By Aaron van Wirdum

title: The Impact of Institutional Investors on Bitcoin
description: The Institutional Paradox: How Big Money is Reshaping Bitcoin’s Future
author: By Matt Crosby

title: BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF Saw Outflow For the First Time Since May
description: BlackRock's spot Bitcoin ETF, the iShares Bitcoin Trust, saw an outflow of $13.5 million on Thursday, marking the first withdrawal since May 1st amid a third straight day of outflows from Bitcoin ETFs.
author: By Vivek Sen

title: Solo Bitcoin Miner Earns $199,098 After Successfully Mining Block
description: A solo Bitcoin miner successfully mined block number 858,978, earning a reward worth $199,098.
author: By Nik Hoffman

title: The Privacy Issue: Letter From the Editors
description: Bitcoin is code. Code is speech. And writing code is not a crime. Announcing "The Privacy Issue".
author: By Bitcoin Magazine

title: Proton Wallet Review: A Bitcoin Software Wallet That Simplifies Transactions
description: Proton’s new bitcoin wallet lets users send bitcoin as easily as sending an email, but don’t hold your breath waiting for transactions to settle.
author: By Frank Corva

title: Jack Dorsey-Backed Nostr Emerges as Bitcoin's Social Layer at Riga Conference
description: NostrWorld's Nostriga event highlighted strong synergies between Bitcoin and the nascent social protocol.
author: By Alex Bergeron

title: The New Mission Critical Facilities: Bitcoin Mining Farms
description: A look at the operational dynamics and needs of data centers as it relates to Bitcoin mining.
author: By Jose Farrona

title: Australian Spot Bitcoin ETF Keeps on Buying
description: While U.S. Bitcoin ETFs face outflows, Australia's spot Bitcoin ETFs continue steadily accumulating BTC holdings. The ongoing inflows highlight growing mainstream Bitcoin demand in the region.
author: By Vivek Sen

title: Leading Bitcoin Miner GDA Plans Mining Expansion to 400 MV Leveraging Renewables
description: Leading Bitcoin miner GDA plans to expand its recently launched 60 MW Texas data center to 400 MW. The ambitious scaling signals GDA's commitment to leveraging Texas' renewable energy and innovation-friendly policies.
author: By Vivek Sen

title: F%$K Bad Research
description: I spent a month analyzing a Bitcoin mining study and all I got was this trauma response. From "The Halving Issue" and "FUD Fighters" powered by HIVE Digital Technologies.
author: By Margot Paez

title: Lightspark Introduces Instant Bitcoin Lightning Payments for U.S. Businesses with New Feature
description: Lightspark introduces Lightspark Extend, its new solution allowing businesses in the U.S. to offer instant Lightning payments to eligible account holders.
author: By Nik Hoffman

title: The Other Satoshis: Bitcoin's Most Important Early Contributors
description: Early in Bitcoin’s history, many contributors helped the pseudonymous Satoshi Nakamoto shape the technology we all know today. A review of their legacies, from "The Halving Issue".
author: By Pete Rizzo

title: The Security Hustle: Protecting My Bitcoin From Hackers
description: Bitcoin is a highly desirable asset to hackers. This extensive guide will help you protect your funds as a Bitcoin investor.
author: By Ivan Serrano

title: Remembering Hal Finney: A Decade Since His Passing, His Legacy in Bitcoin Lives On
description: Ten years after his passing, Hal Finney's pioneering work in cryptography and computer science continues to inspire the Bitcoin community.
author: By Nik Hoffman

title: Bitwise Brings The Bitcoin Ethos To Wall Street
description: Bitwise co-founder Hong Kim is a hardcore Bitcoiner who’s determined to uphold Bitcoin’s ideals as his company, which issued one of the 11 US spot bitcoin ETFs, brings bitcoin to the world of traditional finance.
author: By Frank Corva

title: Bitcoin ETFs Saw the Largest Outflow in Over Three Weeks
description: U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs saw $127 million in net outflows on Tuesday, marking the largest single-day withdrawal since August 6th. The outflow ended an eight-day streak of positive inflows totaling $756 million into the Bitcoin products.
author: By Vivek Sen

title: A Manual Guide to Killing Bitcoin: The Eternal Return
description: From the fall of peer-to-peer networks to the dangers of blind optimism, this guide explores how Bitcoin could face existential threats unless we change course. Overconfidence and arrogance could be Bitcoin's biggest threats. From "The Halving Issue".
author: By L0la L33tz

title: An Untold Story of Bitcoin in Thailand
description: The story of Didier Somnuke, a Thai Bitcoiner, and his journey through Bitcoin.
author: By Win Ko Ko Aung

title: Nasdaq Seeks SEC Approval for Bitcoin Index Options, Aims to Boost Crypto Market Maturity
description: Nasdaq partners with CF Benchmarks to introduce Bitcoin Index Options, enhancing risk management tools and liquidity in the crypto market, pending SEC approval.
author: By Nik Hoffman

title: Hilbert Group Partners with Xapo Bank to Launch $200 Million Bitcoin Hedge Fund
description: Hilbert Group and Xapo Bank have announced a strategic partnership to launch a Bitcoin-denominated hedge fund exceeding $200 million, set to launch in September 2024.
author: By Nik Hoffman

title: BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF Saw Highest Inflow in Over a Month
description: BlackRock's spot Bitcoin ETF saw its largest single-day inflow in over a month on Monday, taking in $224 million amid a slight Bitcoin pullback. The sizable injection extends an 8-day streak of net inflows into US spot Bitcoin ETFs.
author: By Vivek Sen

title: BTC Currently Valued at Fair Market Price, Bitcoin Magazine Pro Data Shows
description: Bitcoin Magazine Pro’s Bitcoin Cycle Master tool rates Bitcoin’s current price of $63,500 as fair market value, signaling potential growth based on historical trends and on-chain metrics.
author: By Nik Hoffman

title: Semler Scientific Buys Additional $5 Million Worth of Bitcoin
description: Medical device maker Semler Scientific purchased an additional 83 Bitcoin for $5 Million, boosting its total Bitcoin treasury to 1,012 BTC acquired for $68M. Semler is pursuing a strategy of buying Bitcoin with cash reserves.
author: By Vivek Sen

title: Hong Kong Bitcoin ETFs Hits HK $2 Billion in AUM
description: The 3 Hong Kong spot Bitcoin ETFs surpassed HK$2 billion ($272M) in assets under management since launching this year. The growth shows increasing institutional appetite for regulated Bitcoin products in Asia.
author: By Vivek Sen

title: Report From The DNC: Democrats Warm Up To Bitcoin And Crypto, But Offer No Policy Specifics
description: While there was hardly any talk of Bitcoin or crypto at the Democratic National Convention (DNC) this week, Democrats are no longer ignoring the topic.
author: By Frank Corva

title: Is the Bitcoin Bull Cycle Over?
description: Diminishing Returns: Is Bitcoin's Cooling-Off Period a Precursor to New Highs?
author: By Matt Crosby

title: 4,500 Companies Now Pay Their Employees in Bitcoin Using Bitwage
description: Bitwage now serves over 4,500 companies and 90,000 users that leverage its platform to pay employee salaries in Bitcoin and crypto. Bitwage is on track to process over $400 million in payroll transactions this year.
author: By Vivek Sen

title: US Bitcoin ETFs Saw the Sixth Consecutive Day of Inflows
description: US spot Bitcoin ETFs saw their sixth consecutive day of net inflows totalling around $65 million, highlighting growing mainstream institutional demand. BlackRock's IBIT led the day with $75.5 million in inflows.
author: By Vivek Sen

title: Hong Kong Spot Bitcoin ETFs Saw Highest Inflows in a Month
description: Hong Kong's Spot Bitcoin ETFs saw their largest inflow in over a month, with the ChinaAMC Bitcoin ETF taking in 274 BTC worth $15M. The steady climb in assets shows growing Asian interest in regulated Bitcoin investment products.
author: By Vivek Sen

title: Tim Draper Invests in Ark Labs to Make Bitcoin Payments Easier
description: Bitcoin scalability startup Ark Labs raised $2.5M in a pre-seed round led by Tim Draper to advance its Ark protocol for faster, cheaper BTC payments. The funding aims to boost Bitcoin adoption for everyday transactions.
author: By Alex Bergeron

title: Bitcoin’s Role as Collateral in Real Estate Development Financing
description: A look at the dynamics of bitcoin as collateral in real estate financing.
author: By Leon Wankum

title: Gryphon Digital Mining Acquires Low-Cost Bitcoin Mining Operations at $0.01/kWh
description: Gryphon Digital Mining has secured a deal to acquire Bitcoin mining operations with ultra low-cost power.
author: By Nik Hoffman

title: Theya Introduces Direct-To-Wallet Bitcoin Purchases
description: Theya’s new feature reduces the hassle of transferring your bitcoin from an exchange into a secure self-custody setup.
author: By Frank Corva
